caption.center: ALVA F. WALLANDER, Respondent, v. RALPH GILLETTE, Appellant.

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, Second Department.

opinion.posture: Appeal by defendant from so much of an order as grants plaintiff's motion to strike out paragraph IX of his answer, embodying a defense based on section 1083-b, Civil Practice Act, in an action for interest due under a bond, secured by a mortgage on real property, executed by the defendant and delivered to the plaintiff.
opinion.opinion_text: Order, insofar as appealed from, affirmed, with ten dollars costs and disbursements. No opinion. Close, P.J., Carswell, Johnston, Adel and Taylor, JJ., concur.
